alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 23 at 5:40PM CST until February 24 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST FRIDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Wilkin County. In North Dakota, Richland County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing snow may continue through the early evening hours, however visibility issues should continue to become more sparse as winds diminish.
info.instruction: Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing.
